Net experience – USA.Looking for an experienced technical project manager that can hit the ground running as part of the Global Sanctions Risk and Compliance team in GRCT. The candidate must be experience of managing the distributed applications especially .NET/API's and be a team contribute candidate will be expected to complete document and co-ordinate with multiple technology teams, product, business and ensure the delivery schedule. They will be part of an end-to-end team and may have to participate in RFC's, tracking application deployment, and tracking proc issues with the components they deliver. Candidate should be an excellent communicator and willing to speak up to contribute and participial meetings and Agile ceremonies.
